languages.text: "Заодно помогу ей не растранжирить деньги почем зря, а, может, даже и приумножить ее и ваше состояние. Думаю, наилучшим вложением будет торговый корабль. Начну обучать девочку основам судоходства, найду проверенных поставщиков, дерну за пару ниточек в Администратуме, и вот у нас уже и какой-никакой бизнес на руках".

traits.locale_text: "Заодно помогу ей не растранжирить деньги почем зря, а может даже и приумножить ее и ваше состояние. Думаю, наилучшим вложением будет торговый корабль. Начну обучать девочку основам судоходства, найду проверенных поставщиков, дерну за пару ниточек в Администратуме, и вот у нас уже и какой-никакой бизнес на руках".

languages.text: "While I'm at it, I'll also help her not to squander her whole fortune — maybe even earn something extra both for herself and you. I think the best investment would be a merchant ship. I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."
languages.original_text: "Заодно помогу ей не растранжирить деньги почем зря, а, может, даже и приумножить ее и ваше состояние. Думаю, наилучшим вложением будет торговый корабль. Начну обучать девочку основам судоходства, найду проверенных поставщиков, дерну за пару ниточек в Администратуме, и вот у нас уже и какой-никакой бизнес на руках".

I think the best investment would be a merchant ship. I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

languages.text: 「その間は、彼女が全財産を浪費してしまわないように、私も協力しましょう。彼女にとってもあなたにとっても、得るものがあるはずです。一番の投資は商船でしょうか。ヴォイドの旅の基本を教え、信頼できるサプライヤーを見つけ、行政局にいくらかの伝手を作れば…彼女も真っ当な事業を持てるようになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "While I'm at it, I'll also help her not to squander her whole fortune — maybe even earn something extra both for herself and you. I think the best investment would be a merchant ship. I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

traits.locale_text: 「その間は、彼女が全財産を浪費してしまわないように、私も協力しましょう。彼女にとってもあなたにとっても、得るものがあるはずです。一番の投資は商船でしょうか。ヴォイドの旅の基本を教え、信頼できるサプライヤーを見つけ、行政局にいくらかの伝手を作れば…彼女も真っ当な事業を持てるようになるでしょう」

languages.text: “我照顾她的这段时间，会尽量帮助她不要把所有的财富都浪费掉，甚至说不定会帮她、帮你赚到额外的收入。我认为最合适的投资项目应该就是商船。我会教给她一些基础的航行知识，找几家可靠的供应商，在内政部里面走走后门。这样一来，她应该就会拥有一家相当像样的企业了。”
languages.original_text: "While I'm at it, I'll also help her not to squander her whole fortune — maybe even earn something extra both for herself and you. I think the best investment would be a merchant ship. I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

traits.locale_text: “我照顾她的这段时间，会尽量帮助她不要把所有的财富都浪费掉，甚至说不定会帮她、帮你赚到额外的收入。我认为最合适的投资项目应该就是商船。我会教给她一些基础的航行知识，找几家可靠的供应商，在内政部里面走走后门。这样一来，她应该就会拥有一家相当像样的企业了。”

languages.text: « Tant que j'y suis, je l'aiderai également à ne pas dilapider sa fortune... Je pourrai peut-être même faire en sorte de l'accroître, pour elle et pour vous. Je pense que le meilleur investissement serait un navire marchand. Je lui apprendrai les bases du voyage stellaire, puis je lui trouverai quelques fournisseurs fiables et je ferai jouer mes relations à l'Administratum. Ainsi, elle devrait pouvoir monter une entreprise digne de ce nom. »
languages.original_text: "While I'm at it, I'll also help her not to squander her whole fortune — maybe even earn something extra both for herself and you. I think the best investment would be a merchant ship. I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

traits.locale_text: « Tant que j'y suis, je l'aiderai également à ne pas dilapider sa fortune... Je pourrai peut-être même faire en sorte de l'accroître, pour elle et pour vous. Je pense que le meilleur investissement serait un navire marchand. Je lui apprendrai les bases du voyage stellaire, puis je lui trouverai quelques fournisseurs fiables et je ferai jouer mes relations à l'Administratum. Ainsi, elle devrait pouvoir monter une entreprise digne de ce nom. »

languages.text: «De paso, le enseñaré a no derrochar toda su fortuna. Es más, igual acaba ganándose un dinero extra, para ella y para usted. Creo que la mejor opción es una nave mercante. Le enseñaré a navegar por el vacío, encontraré proveedores de confianza, moveré algunos hilos en el Administratum... y tendrá una empresa decente».
languages.original_text: "While I'm at it, I'll also help her not to squander her whole fortune — maybe even earn something extra both for herself and you. I think the best investment would be a merchant ship. I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

traits.locale_text: «De paso, le enseñaré a no derrochar toda su fortuna. Es más, igual acaba ganándose un dinero extra, para ella y para usted. Creo que la mejor opción es una nave mercante. Le enseñaré a navegar por el vacío, encontraré proveedores de confianza, moveré algunos hilos en el Administratum... y tendrá una empresa decente».

languages.text: "Wo ich schon dabei bin, werde ich ihr auch helfen, nicht ihr ganzes Vermögen zu verprassen ... vielleicht verdiene ich für sie und Euch sogar noch etwas dazu. Ich denke, die beste Investition wäre ein Handelsschiff. Ich bringe ihr die Grundlagen der Raumfahrt bei, besorge einige verlässliche Lieferanten, ziehe im Administratum ein paar Fäden ... und schon hat sie ein lukratives Unternehmen."
languages.original_text: "While I'm at it, I'll also help her not to squander her whole fortune — maybe even earn something extra both for herself and you. I think the best investment would be a merchant ship. I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

traits.locale_text: "Wo ich schon dabei bin, werde ich ihr auch helfen, nicht ihr ganzes Vermögen zu verprassen ... vielleicht verdiene ich für sie und Euch sogar noch etwas dazu. Ich denke, die beste Investition wäre ein Handelsschiff. Ich bringe ihr die Grundlagen der Raumfahrt bei, besorge einige verlässliche Lieferanten, ziehe im Administratum ein paar Fäden ... und schon hat sie ein lukratives Unternehmen."

languages.text: "Hazır elim değmişken tüm serveti çarçur etmediğinden de emin olurum. Hatta belki ikinizin de işine yarayacak bir şeyler yaparız. Bence en iyi yatırım, tüccar gemisi almak olacaktır. Ona uçsuz seyahatinin temellerini öğretirim, güvenilir birkaç tedarikçi bulurum, Administratum'daki tanıdıklarıma ulaşırım. Bu şekilde ona düzgün bir işletme kurarız."
languages.original_text: "While I'm at it, I'll also help her not to squander her whole fortune — maybe even earn something extra both for herself and you. I think the best investment would be a merchant ship. I'll teach her the basics of voidfaring, find some reliable suppliers, pull a few strings in the Administratum — and just like that, she'll have herself a decent enterprise."

traits.locale_text: "Hazır elim değmişken tüm serveti çarçur etmediğinden de emin olurum. Hatta belki ikinizin de işine yarayacak bir şeyler yaparız. Bence en iyi yatırım, bir ticaret gemisi olur. Ona uçsuz seyahatinin temellerini öğretirim, güvenilir birkaç tedarikçi bulurum, Administratum'daki tanıdıklarıma ulaşırım. Böylece ona düzgün bir işletme kurmuş oluruz."
